The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 21 July is 53,276 (6,166.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 16 July, there were 4,020 new confirmed cases (465.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 09 July, there were 2,367 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 70% (1,653 extra cases).
